column2: BRIEF-Tx Group Announces Management Appointments For 20 Minutes Video News Team Jan 23 (Reuters) - TX GROUP AG: * MANAGEMENT OF NEW 20 MINUTES VIDEO NEWS TEAM COULD BE SILVANA GUANZIROLI AND NICOLE ULRICH AS DEPUTY * SILVANA GUANZIROLI TOOK OVER THE MANAGEMENT OF 20 MINUTES VIDEO NEWS TEAM IN EARLY JANUARY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdansk Newsroom)

BRIEF-See Tickets Takes Over Starticket From TX Group Jan 9 (Reuters) - TX GROUP AG: * SEE TICKETS TAKES OVER STARTICKET FROM THE TX GROUP Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdansk Newsroom)

BRIEF-Ternium Reports Qtrly Earnings Per ADS Of $1.87 April 25 (Reuters) - Ternium SA: * EXPECTS OPERATING INCOME TO INCREASE IN Q2 2018 COMPARED TO Q1 2018 * ANTICIPATES STEEL SHIPMENTS IN MEXICAN MARKET TO REMAIN AT HEALTHY LEVELS * EXPECTS STEEL SHIPMENTS AND REVENUE PER TON TO SLIGHTLY INCREASE IN ARGENTINE MARKET IN Q2 2018 VERSUS Q1 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
